comments.author: Devra
comments.content: Whole Foods sells a Tuscan Salt seasoning mix that I often use in this kind of thing-quick veggies, quickly seasoned. Not an affiliate deal for me either, but a lovely, versatile product.

comments.author: Lisa
comments.content: Yum, this looks awesome. Having difficulty finding cherry vinegar locally. Curious - is it high in sugar?

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: Hi Lisa - that cherry vinegar was an import that I got from ChefShop.com. Not sure if they still carry it. It didn't have a nutrition label on it, so I can't tell you exactly how much sugar, but it was moderately sweet, like a good balsamic - which would also be good in this dish.
